#summary Stages of development

= The Common plan =

== Types of users (Roles) ==

 # *Admin* which can add
  * the new user with granted role (Admin, Operator, Driver, Customer)
 # *Operator* which can add/modify 
  * any information into directories: Autos (Cars, Drivers), Customers, Orders
 # *Driver* which can add/modify
  * information about execution of the Order (set orders _state_)
 # *Customer* which can look at
  * information about him orders

== Layouts ==

 # Create the *form for the Operator* (for the _Operator_ role).
  * Navigation menu
   * Orders
    * Create order
    * Show active orders
    * View all Orders
   * Autos
   * Customers
  * Main container
 # Create *forms for directories* (for the _Admin_ and _Operator_ roles).
  * _Separate_ form
  * _Inline_ form in the main form for the operator role
  # *Users accounts*
  # *Autos* with calling the _Cars_ and the _Drivers_ forms
  # *Cars*
  # *Type of Cars*
  # *Drivers*
  # *Customers*
  # *Prices*
 # Create the *form for the Driver*
  * Navigation menu
   * *My Info*
    * My *Personal* info
    * My *Car* info
   * *Orders*
    * Create orders
    * Active order (with changing Order's State in Orders_Timetable)
    * View my *Orders*
   * Show new orders
  * Main container
 # Create the *form for the Customer*
  * Navigation menu
   * *My Info*
    * My *Personal* info
   * *Orders*
    * Create order
    * View my *Orders*
  * Main container

== Functional ==
 * Calculate Route length and price (using tables Routes, Prices)
 * Search Autos (using Route, Autos(r_waiting, r_route))
